task.title: Configuring the Stream Selector
task.shortdesc: Use a Stream Selector to route data to different streams.

step.cmd: In the Properties panel, optionally enter a name and description for the stage.
Enter a condition for the first stream.
To create another stream, click the Add icon and then enter the condition for the second stream.
step.info: Repeat this step to configure the number of streams that you need.

step.cmd: To use a default stream to capture any records that do not match the other conditions, click the Add icon and then enter the following condition: ${default}.
For Fallback Action, select the action to take for records that do not match the conditions:

ul.li: Drop record. Drops the record from the pipeline.
Record to error. Writes the record to the error log.

step.cmd: To define a constant for use in conditions, enter the name and value for the constant.
To add additional constants, click Add and configure the constant.
Optionally include Required Fields for the stage.
step.info: You might want to add any field that you use in condition as a required field.
